name: Uniform Girl
description:
Rubber：Wipe out the girl, wipe off the clothes, hehehehe(●ˇ∀ˇ●)

Game Features
1.Contains 15 groups of characters(●'◡'●)！
2.Each character contains 3 animations, which need to be triggered interactively（￣︶￣）↗！
3. Some character animations have separate stockings
4.Simple to play, easy to pass♪(^∇^*)！
Two ways to unlock social security DLC：All the gentlemen's doors want to see are in DLC
1.Click install https://store.steampowered.com/widget/1268010
2.Press the key combination“ Win + R”Enter：steam://install/1268010或steam://rungameid/1268010,Press Enter to download free DLC
